TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TextRange extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示兩個 位置之間的內容選取範圍。

span.span: Represents a selection of content between two positions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別引進了下列詞彙。The class introduces the following terminology. - **選取項目**-是由兩個位置之間的內容選取範圍**TextPointers**。**Selection** - A is a selection of content between two positions indicated by **TextPointers**. 可移動的另一個位置時，其中會將選取範圍，對於固定錨點。One of these positions a fixed anchor with respect to the selection, while the other position is movable. 這是類似的選擇會由使用者使用滑鼠或鍵盤的運作方式。This is similar to how a selection made by a user using the mouse or keyboard behaves. - **目前的選取項目**-因為一律表示選取範圍在內容中，所以合理單純指所指定的選取項目作為*目前選取範圍*。**Current Selection** - Because a always indicates a selection in content, it makes sense to simply refer to the selection indicated by a as the *current selection*. - **文字容器**-*文字容器*form 非固定格式內容手邊的 ultimate 框線的項目，以選取永遠落在文字容器內。**Text Container** - A *text container* is the element that forms the ultimate border for the flow content at hand; the selection indicated by a always falls within a text container. 目前的文字容器都必須在或。Currently, a text container must be either a or a . - **文件**-共同文字容器內所包含的內容指*文件*。**Document** - The content collectively contained within a text container is referred to as a *document*. 如需有關其他的詳細資訊相關的類似*位置*，請參閱。For more information about other related terms like *position*, see . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用的屬性傳回指定的純文字表示法。The following example demonstrates using the property of a to return the plain text representation of a specified . [!code-csharp[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextRange_Text](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textrange_text)] [!code-vb[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextRange_Text](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textrange_text)]

span.span: A movable position that marks the other end of the selection used to form the new .

summary.span: 取兩個指定的 位置做為新範圍的開始和結束位置，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, taking two specified positions as the beginning and end positions for the new range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A從選取項目所表示的兩個位置之間形成**TextPointers**。A is formed from a selection between two positions indicated by **TextPointers**. 這些位置的其中一個 (由`position1`) 固定的相關選取項目，而另一個位置 (由`position2`) 是可移動。One of these positions (indicated by `position1`) is fixed with respect to the selection, while the other position (indicated by `position2`) is movable. 這是類似的選擇會由使用者使用滑鼠或鍵盤的運作方式。This is similar to how a selection made by a user using the mouse or keyboard behaves. 新的實際兩端您可以調整以符合包含新的文件適用於任何選取項目啟發學習法。The actual ends of the new may be adjusted to match any selection heuristics that are applicable to the document that contains the new . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用建構函式。The following example demonstrates the use of the constructor. param.name: stream
param.span: 包含要載入目前選取範圍之資料的可讀取資料流。

param.name: dataFormat
param.span: 載入資料時要採用的資料格式。

param.span: 目前支援的資料格式有 、、 和 。

span.span: Currently supported data formats are , , , and .

summary.span: 從指定的資料流載入指定之資料格式的目前選取範圍。

span.span: Loads the current selection in a specified data format from a specified stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已`true`如`stream`，從資料流開頭到資料流的結尾載入內容。If is `true` for `stream`, content will be loaded from the beginning of the stream to the end of the stream. 否則，內容會讀取從目前資料流的結尾。Otherwise, content will be read from the current to the end of the stream. 當這個方法傳回時，`stream`處於 [開啟] 和中的目前位置`stream`是未定義。When this method returns, `stream` is left open, and the current position within `stream` is undefined. 載入作業會以新載入的內容取代目前的選取範圍。A load operation replaces the current selection with the newly loaded content. ## Examples 下列範例示範 方法的用法。The following example demonstrates the use of the method. [!code-csharp[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextRange_LoadSave](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textrange_loadsave)] [!code-vb[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextRange_LoadSave](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textrange_loadsave)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這個方法傳回時，`stream`處於 [開啟] 和中的目前位置`stream`是未定義。When this method returns, `stream` is left open, and the current position within `stream` is undefined. 做為一部分儲存作業，目前的選取範圍中的內容可能會轉換成指定的資料格式`dataFormat`。As part of the save operation, content in the current selection may be converted to the data format specified by `dataFormat`. ## Examples 下列範例示範 方法的用法。The following example demonstrates the use of the method. span.span: Saves the current selection to a specified stream in a specified data format, with the option of preserving custom objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當`preserveTextElements`已`false`自訂物件會儲存為已知型別。When `preserveTextElements` is `false`, custom objects are saved as known types. 例如，假設您建立自訂名`Heading1`，該項則繼承自。For example, suppose you create a custom called `Heading1`, which inherits from . 當您呼叫這個方法時`preserveTextElements`設定為`false`，`Heading1`轉換成當儲存。When you call this method with `preserveTextElements` set to `false`, `Heading1` is converted to a when the is saved. 當您呼叫這個方法時`preserveTextElements`設定為`true`，`Heading1`儲存不需轉換。When you call this method with `preserveTextElements` set to `true`, `Heading1` is saved without being converted. 要保留自訂文字項目，`dataFormat`必須設為。To preserve custom text elements, `dataFormat` must be set to . .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

summary.span: 採用兩個 位置指出更新的選取範圍，更新目前選取範圍。

span.span: Updates the current selection, taking two positions to indicate the updated selection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A從選取項目所表示的兩個位置之間形成**TextPointers**。A is formed from a selection between two positions indicated by **TextPointers**. 這些位置的其中一個 (由`position1`) 固定的相關選取項目，而另一個位置 (由`position2`) 是可移動。One of these positions (indicated by `position1`) is fixed with respect to the selection, while the other position (indicated by `position2`) is movable. 這是類似的選擇會由使用者使用滑鼠或鍵盤的運作方式。This is similar to how a selection made by a user using the mouse or keyboard behaves. 新的選取範圍的實際端點可能會被調整成符合可套用至包含新的目前選取範圍的文件的任何選取項目啟發學習法。The actual ends of the new selection may be adjusted to match any selection heuristics that are applicable to the document that contains the new current selection.

summary.span: 取得標示選取範圍開頭的位置。

span.span: Gets the position that marks the beginning of the current selection.
A that points to the beginning of the current selection.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性。The following example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-csharp[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextRange_StartEnd](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textrange_startend)] [!code-vb[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextRange_StartEnd](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textrange_startend)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Text { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Text : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定目前選取範圍的純文字內容。

span.span: Gets or sets the plain text contents of the current selection.

value.span: 字串，包含目前選取範圍的純文字內容。

span.span: A string containing the plain text contents of the current selection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性來擷取目前的選取範圍，無論可能存在的任何格式設定中的純文字內容。Use this property to extract the plain text content in the current selection, regardless of any formatting that may be present. 新行字元和段落符號會被視為相對於這個屬性的對等項目。New line characters and paragraph breaks are treated as equivalent with respect to this property. 任何類型的內容符號出現在目前的選取範圍會轉換成新行中，當這個屬性唯讀。Any types of content breaks present in the current selection are converted to new lines when this property is read. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性。The following example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-csharp[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextRange_Text](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_textrange_text)] [!code-vb[TextPointer_Snippets#_TextRange_Text](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextPointer_Snippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_textrange_text)]
